headline: Sturdy Streaming Numbers Indicate a Turnaround at Walt Disney (DIS)
summary: Walt Disney’s (DIS) Q2 FY2025 results revealed a pleasant surprise last week. The entertainment conglomerate’s stock jumped 10% after it announced that its Disney+ subscriber count jumped 1.1% to 126 million, beating estimates of around 123.3 million. Meanwhile, despite macroeconomic pressures, Disney’s entertainment segment saw revenues climb 9%, thanks to a strong domestic performance. The sparkling quarter comes just a couple of years after its CEO, Bob Iger, oversaw a strategic restructuring

headline: Media Stocks Q1 Highlights: News Corp (NASDAQ:NWSA)
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how media stocks fared in Q1, starting with News Corp (NASDAQ:NWSA).
